original_text: They seized the livestock of the Hagrites—fifty thousand camels, two hundred fifty thousand sheep and two thousand donkeys. They also took one hundred thousand people captive,
korean_text: 그들이 대적의 짐승 곧 낙타 오만 마리와 양 이십오만 마리와 나귀 이천 마리를 빼앗으며 사람 십만 명을 사로잡았고

sentences.original_text: They seized the livestock of the Hagrites
They also took one hundred thousand people captive
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 십만 명의 사람들을 사로잡았다
